original_text: Afterward, as you know, when he wanted to inherit this blessing, he was rejected. Even though he sought the blessing with tears, he could not change what he had done.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 그가 그 후에 축복을 이어받으려고 눈물을 흘리며 구하되 버린 바가 되어 회개할 기회를 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 너희가 아는 바와 같이

sentences.original_text: when he wanted to inherit this blessing
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 축복을 받으려고 했을 때

sentences.original_text: Even though he sought the blessing with tears
he could not change what he had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 한 일을 바꿀 수 없었습니다
